translations: v.隐藏，遮蔽；（使）费解；（使）相形见绌（obscure 的过去式及过去分词）

sentences.sentence: The view was obscured by fog.
The ground-floor windows are obscured by wire mesh.
sentences.translation: 底楼的窗户被铁丝网罩着。

sentences.sentence: Trees obscured his vision; he couldn't see much of the square's southern half.
sentences.translation: 树木遮住了他的视线，他不怎么看得见广场南半部。
